svg.text: Connecting Health and Climate Change | October 16-18, 2025
All times in local Tallinn time (GMT+3)

g.text: Dr. Sarah Mitchell - WHO Climate Health Lead
Prof. Elena Rodriguez - Global One Health Alliance
Dr. James Chen - IPCC Health Chapter Lead
Darshnika, Danielle, Mukhtaar (Posters) | Lebohang, Craig (Parallel Sessions)
Matthew, Cathal (Attribution) | Celeste, Nicholas, Natasha (Day 2 Parallels)
• Please arrive 15 minutes early for your sessions
• Poster presenters: Setup 08:00-08:45 Day 1, Remove after Day 2
• All sessions will be recorded (with permission)
• Conference app available for real-time updates
Registration Desk: PETERSON II Room (08:00-17:00 daily)
